biotools.summary:
a webserver to infer fingerprints of structural communication in biomacromolecules.

webPSN is a free web server for high throughput investigation of allosterism in biological systems, which employs a mixed Protein Structure Network (PSN) and Elastic Network Model-Normal Mode Analysis (ENM-NMA), i.e. PSN-ENM, strategy to investigate the structural communication in proteins and nucleic acids [1-7, 10] .

bioschemas.name: webPSN
